title: Aztec Ruins National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Aztec Ruins   7 Photos  The main archeological site is a large ancestral Pueblo Great House with over 400 rooms. Many people think it was built for ceremonial or social purposes.          Artifacts   2 Photos  Many interesting artifacts were recovered from Aztec Ruins, including decorated pottery, trade goods, and tools for daily living.
